sentence: One thing he was right about was that Biden's weakness would invite Putin's aggression," agreed former Trump advisor and Ohio congressional candidate Max Miller.
author: Kathryn Joyce
title: CPAC opens and immediately devolves into GOP dissent over Ukraine

sentence: And some of Trump's chosen candidates were there as well - including Max Miller of Ohio, who is vying to replace the retiring GOP Rep. Anthony Gonzalez, an impeachment backer, and Kelly Tshibaka, taking on Republican Sen. Lisa Murkowski, who said Trump should be convicted for inciting an insurrection.
title: Trump blasts Biden over Putin's invasion of Ukraine

sentence: EXCLUSIVE: ORLANDO, Fla.—Ohio GOP congressional candidate and former Trump administration official Max Miller said Russian President Vladimir Putin saw "weak leadership" from President Biden ahead of launching a multi-front war in Ukraine, which he said emboldened him to invade.
author: Brooke Singman
title: Ohio congressional candidate Max Miller says Putin saw 'weak leadership' from Biden before invading Ukraine

sentence: And some of Trump's chosen candidates were there as well - including Max Miller of Ohio, who is vying to replace the retiring GOP Rep. Anthony Gonzalez, an impeachment backer, and Kelly Tshibaka, taking on Republican Sen. Lisa Murkowski, who said Trump should be convicted for inciting an insurrection.
title: 'The real problem is that our leaders are dumb': Trump blasts Biden over Putin's invasion of Ukraine boasting that it wouldn't have happened on his watch - as he teases a 2024 run

author: Rebeccah Heinrichs
title: Putin's nuclear threats in Ukraine war – here's how US, allies must respond

title: Biden Blunders on the World Stage
